sentences.sContent: Deep caries based by the glass ions cementation agent, could significantly reduce composite resin pulp stimulation to protect pulp, and better effect.
sentences.sContent_eng: Deep caries based by the glass ions cementation agent, could significantly reduce composite resin pulp stimulation to protect pulp, and better effect.
sentences.sCn: 深龋经玻璃离子粘固剂垫底后，能明显减轻复合树脂对牙髓的刺激作用，从而护髓效果更佳。
